title: Animal Attraction
description: Did you enjoy any of these?Her Unexpected Engagement by Kyra JacobsCrazy, Wicked Love by Melissa FosterWhat Lovers Do by Jewel E. AnnDrive Me Wild by Melanie HarlowYou'll love this!The fastest way to fall in love? Swear off dating. Tired of meeting men who only wanted to use her as an in with her famous father, Rachael Eller gave up on dating and focused her affection on a pair of lovable rescue dogs. A savvy and successful businesswoman in the suburbs of Cincinnati, her opposition to romance crumbled in the face of a daring prospective client and a local veterinarian. How could fate be so cruel to send these two amazing men into her life at the same time? Can she risk her career for love?
author: Kathryn Halberg
